content: SPX Epoxy diamond cup wheel Ultimate diamond cup wheel for angle grinders– for removing of thick coatings such as epoxy ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster coating removal – these PCD cup wheels (polycrystalline diamond) are especially effective at removing coatings from concrete Ultimate lifetime – protective segments help prevent breakdowns and rapid wear of PCD segments Advanced cooling – patented cooling pins help to prevent damage to the cup wheel segments due to overheating Robust – these cup wheels are built from the highest-grade materials using durable contact welding Minimized vibration – every cup wheel is individually checked and balanced before leaving the plant Applications Removing thick coatings such as polyurethane, epoxy and plastics ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Corded angle grinder Base material: Polyurethane, Epoxy, Plastic Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Corded angle grinder | Base material | Polyurethane, Epoxy, Plastic | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2238557 - Diamond cup wheel 5 SPX epoxy - Package Size 1 pc
